name: Arrhythmia
description:
A rhythm game without rhythm! Made for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018

Controls: Arrow keys to press notes, mouse to click buttons and faces

Beatmaps are randomly generated. 

Credit (this game is not monetized. the game is still functionally the same without the music.):

Song list: Smash Mouth - All Star, Phineas and Ferb - Ain't Got Rhythm, Luis Fonzi - Despacito, Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up

Font: Orbitron by Matt McInerney
